description: Attacker uses PowerShell to interact with WMI to delete shadow copies, bypassing direct calls to vssadmin.exe or wmic.exe and evading the rule.
evasion_technique: The rule specifically looks for process names 'vssadmin.exe', 'wmic.exe', or 'bcdedit.exe'. Using PowerShell with CIM/WMI calls to perform the same action evades this detection.
